Really good meat! Just a lovely athmosphere. I have been here a few times before and I will defenitly come back!

Name: La Boca
Review Text: Great staff, great food and prices not too bad either. Highly recommend the mixed grill that came out with hot charcoal and the best cuts of meat. Finished with pancakes with fresh strawberries and cream! Will definitely be returning. Thanks.

Name: La Boca
Review Text: Kind staff, service was fast. You don't need to wait so long time. Would welcome more space, we luckily catched a seat. We chose a 3-dish menu (soup/calamares, beef/chicken/salmon and desert coffee or icecream). Prices are normal, as in other restaurants in Amsterdam. We paid totally 38 euros for drinks and 2 menus.

Name: La Boca
Review Text: More than a hour for 2 starters. They totally forgot my food but didn't accept any complains. Unpolite staff. Children are not welcome.

Name: La Boca
Review Text: If you go here get the platter! Not my favorite place in Amsterdam but I would eat there again. As long as you get the 5 meat platter pictured below, your money will be well spent. Otherwise it's a tad on the expensive side. Staff was nice and helpful. Very cool and central location for those checking out the city center as well!

Name: La Boca
Review Text: Staff very friendly, fast service. Food is OK.... By my opinion portions could be little bit bigger. Staff speaking multiple language. Meet is tasty and fresh.

Name: La Boca
Review Text: Worst experience in Amsterdam. waited 40+ min for a tapas starter, unfrendly employees built a 1 min  plate in front of me and demanded payment when I gave up.

Name: La Boca
Review Text: Great food. Super friendly staff and atmosphere. Totally recommended.

Review Text: i ate there only the spare ribs and it was amazing and HUGE. you could easily share it with a friend. otherwise, the drinks are pretty expensive and they don't serve tap water on purpose, so you have to buy a drink. that is a but unfair so it's a 1-star lose for them.

Name: La Boca
Review Text: Big plates, tasty, but don't expect something fantastic. Good place overall, burgers, a lot of stakes on the menu.

Name: La Boca
Review Text: Cosy little restaurant. I ordered the mixed grill and it was amazing in taste and price - it fed two people! The staff are lovely and warm and the atmosphere and music were great as well. Definitely recommend.

Name: La Boca
Review Text: Unpleasant place. It was completely empty and we said that we wanted to order some drinks and use the bathroom. He answered "the bathroom is only for customers". We repeated that we were actually going to order as well but he said that he didn't serve just drinks and that we had to order food first to be served at all.

Review Text: The meat was tasty and well prepared. The quality of the meat was very good.

Review Text: Great meat: all kinds of meat that four of us tried was perfect: steaks, lamp and even chicken nuggets from the kids menu were fantastic. House wine was also worth testing. Nice attitude and family like atmosphere made our evening.

Name: La Boca
Review Text: Very nice food and a great place to go. Thanks to the whole crew here!

Name: La Boca
Review Text: Good experience with this argentina-style restaurant. Good prices, stuff were friendly and fast. Our dinner was classic bacon burger. Simple and especially very tasty. Moreover, at a very acceptable price :) I recommend this place.

Name: La Boca
Review Text: We chose the sirlion and rump steaks, probably the best steak i have ever eaten, perfectly cooked, patas bravas was the usual resturant style but still good. Staff were very welcoming and helpful. Very happy will definitely be making a return visit and recommending to friends.

Name: La Boca
Review Text: Very nice Greek Restaurant nice salads also. Authentic food. Service was attentive. Good location.  Mid priced.
